SCTX:
begin Colony_first_boat

;boat for first service provider, enabled after stage one

short doonce

if (doonce == 1 )
	return
endif


if ( ColonyState < 3 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
elseif ( ColonyState >= 3 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		if ( doonce < 1 )
			Enable
			set doonce to 1
		endif
	endif
endif


end Colony_first_boat
